articles.author: Tales Azzoni | AP
articles.title: Barcelona replaces Valverde with former Betis coach Setién
articles.description: Barcelona is making a rare coaching change midway through the season
articles.content:
It is the first time since 2003 that Barcelona is making a change in the middle of the season. Louis van Gaal left the club that January, and since then six other coaches have begun their stints at the start of the season.
Valverde was in charge of the teams… [+820 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Lebanese protesters block road outside central bank
articles.description: Lebanese protesters have returned to the streets after weeks of calm, impatient with politicians failing to tackle a deepening economic crisis
articles.content:
Panic has set in among residents who fear their deposits are in danger. Nationwide protests for three months have failed to pressure politicians to form a new government to institute drastic reforms.
